resources.string: You have 10 questions to answer, 10 different subjects, you get 1 point for every correct answer, try to do your best !
Who was the top scorer in the FIFA World Cup 1970 ?
Complete this movie title : \"One Million Dollars : ...\"
Who are the two smallest countries from this list ?
In which TV shows we can find Scientists ?
In which country \"Sushis\" are the national meal?
Who\'s known to be the founder of the \"Cubisme\" ?
